message: Good day Bob, I have a fantastic product that I believe you might be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $18000. This price reflects the high quality and value of the item. I hope we can make a deal!
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but that's a bit higher than I was expecting. I can offer $12000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I considered your offer and I am willing to lower my price. I can offer you the product for $15000. This is a great deal that reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I can still only offer $13500 for the product.
